title: Pre-market action: Here's the trade setup for today's session
summary: Markets closed the holiday-shortened week with modest gains, continuing a consolidation phase. The upcoming week, marking the transition to 2026, is expected to see increased volatility due to the December F&O expiry. Key domestic data releases and FII/DII actions will be closely watched.

title: Stocks in news: PNB, IndiGo, Sigachi Industries, Coal India, Coforge
summary: Indian markets saw a slight dip, continuing their consolidation phase. Trading activity remained subdued due to low volumes. However, specific company news is creating opportunities. PNB reported a large fraud. IndiGo's market share decreased. Coal India appointed a new CEO. Vedanta received a conditional nod for drilling. Sigachi Industries' MD and CEO was remanded.

title: Global stocks hold near record, silver falls from peak
summary: Global stocks hovered near record highs amid light trading, while silver surged to a new peak, extending a historic year-end rally. Equities saw gains in Australia, with modest declines anticipated in Japan. Investors are closely watching AI trends and Federal Reserve interest rate policy for 2026 market direction.

title: Will Encora acquisition cement Coforge’s AI leadership in healthcare and hi-tech?
summary: Coforge is acquiring California-based Encora for $2.35 billion, bolstering its AI capabilities in healthcare and hi-tech, and expanding its US market presence. This strategic move aims to position Coforge for future growth, with the combined entity projected to significantly increase revenue and potentially become India's seventh-largest software exporter.

title: Nifty faces 26,200 hurdle; indicators flag uncertainty
summary: Nifty 50 is consolidating near all-time highs, facing resistance at 26,200, indicating near-term indecision. Analysts suggest range-bound trade with sector-specific opportunities, while Bank Nifty shows signs of potential profit-booking. Experts recommend specific stock bets like Lupin and Varun Beverages for potential gains.

title: Stock Radar: Manappuram Finance hits fresh record highs in December; will the rally continue in 2026?
summary: Manappuram Finance broke out of a three-month consolidation to hit fresh record highs, signalling further upside. Strong volumes, bullish MACD, and a Supertrend buy trigger support momentum. Analysts highlight accumulation near 290 and improving gold-loan demand. Traders may buy with a target of Rs 330 in 2–3 weeks and a stop loss below Rs 305.

title: Bandhan Bank sells Rs 3,212 crore microfinance bad loans to ARCIL
summary: Bandhan Bank has sold a ₹3,212 crore microfinance non-performing loan portfolio to ARCIL for ₹578 crore. This sale followed a Swiss Challenge process. The bank also initiated a process to sell an additional ₹3,720 crore in loans. These actions come as the bank's asset quality faced pressure from the microfinance segment.

title: Finance ministry to take a relook at crop insurance plan
summary: The finance ministry is reviewing the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana's cup-and-cap model. This comes as crop insurance business declines, with premium collections expected to fall significantly. Large states are shifting to the cup-and-cap model, which limits insurer risk and profitability. The review aims to ensure the scheme's long-term sustainability and effective farmer coverage.

title: Banks urge RBI to extend trade relief measures beyond December
summary: Banks are asking the Reserve Bank of India for more time on loan relief for exporters. The current scheme ends this month. Exporters face ongoing challenges from global trade issues. Banks believe the real impact of these issues will be seen next quarter. An extension would offer a crucial safety net for exporters.

summary: GLOBAL-GRAINS/:GRAINS-Chicago wheat futures slip after Zelenskiy-Trump peace talks

title: Debt mutual funds see slower inflows than hybrid and equity
summary: While equity and hybrid assets grew 1.8 times since November 2023, debt assets grew only 1.3 times. A combination of the 2023 taxation overhaul, which eliminated indexation benefits, and a persistent lack of retail awareness has led to net outflows of  ₹22,105 crore this year.

title: Markets likely to stay cautious in final trading week of 2025
summary: Nifty likely to trend within a 25800-26200 short- term range with a bearish bias amid thin volumes, as high frequency traders and foreign portfolio investors pile up bearish bets. Trading volumes generally thin during the year-end with most investors away on holiday.

summary: MarketSmith India reveals its top stock recommendations for today, 29 December. Get expert insights into the best-performing stocks to guide your investment decisions.

title: Indonesia Set to Revamp Benchmark Rates for Money Market
summary: Indonesia is set to phase out a key money-market benchmark this week, concluding a years-long transition to align with global standards.

title: JBM Group signs exclusivity pact to buy Fortum’s EV charging business in India
summary: JBM Group is drawn to GLIDA's 850 charging points across 29 cities and 25 highways in 17 states amid India’s green-mobility push that depends on the expansion of an effective EV charging network. JBM Group’s flagship firm JBM Auto Ltd is one of India’s largest electric bus manufacturers.

title: MCX, Vedanta among 6 stocks witness 5-year swing high breakout
summary: Six stocks from the Nifty 500 universe touched a 5-year swing high at the close on December 26, signalling strengthening bullish momentum. A 5-year swing high marks the highest price over five years and reflects sustained buying interest, often indicating trend continuation though distinct from a long-term breakout.

title: South Korean shares hit near 2-month high as chipmakers rally
summary: South Korean stocks reached a near two-month high on Monday. Chipmakers like Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix saw significant gains. This surge was driven by optimism surrounding future demand for semiconductors. The KOSPI index performed strongly, marking it as the world's best performer this year. Other sectors showed mixed movements. The South Korean won also strengthened against the dollar.

title: Hindustan Zinc shares in focus as Silver hits new record, crosses $82. What should investors do?
summary: Hindustan Zinc shares are in focus as silver prices hit record highs, driven by low supply and rising demand. The company, a top silver producer, is poised to benefit from these trends, with analysts projecting strong earnings growth and improved cost efficiency. Higher silver prices are expected to significantly boost EBITDA in FY27.

title: Japan's Nikkei slips as tech stocks track Wall Street lower
summary: Tokyo's Nikkei index saw a slight dip on Monday, breaking a two-day rally. Technology shares mirrored a weak Wall Street close. Some major companies traded ex-dividend, impacting the market. Banks, however, showed gains following discussions on interest rate hikes. Value stocks performed better, driven by retail investor interest in NISA accounts.

title: Hindustan Copper shares soar 30% in 6 days to hit record high. What’s fueling the surge and what should traders do now?
summary: Hindustan Copper shares rallied sharply in December, hitting record highs amid rising global copper prices and strong technical momentum. While favourable macro factors and currency trends support the outlook, experts caution on elevated valuations and overbought signals, advising a buy-on-dips strategy for fresh investors.

title: Ola Electric shares in focus as Bharat Cell scooter deliveries scale up across 4 states
summary: Ola Electric Mobility’s shares are set to be in focus after the company said it has scaled up deliveries of scooters powered by its indigenously manufactured 4680 Bharat Cell battery across four states, marking a wider rollout of its in-house EV technology.

title: Defence stocks HAL, BEL, others in focus ahead Defence Acquisition Council meet
summary: Defence stocks are in focus as the Defence Acquisition Council meets today to consider high-value proposals, potentially worth Rs 80,000 crore, for critical military systems. The meeting is expected to boost the order pipeline for domestic manufacturers, with approvals for missile systems and drone leasing on the agenda.

title: IRCTC among 4 stocks showing bullish RSI upswing
summary: Four Nifty 200 stocks showed improving momentum on December 26 after their RSI crossed above the key 50 level from lower zones. This RSI upswing indicates strengthening price action and an emerging bullish bias, helping traders identify early-stage buying opportunities amid improving market sentiment.

title: Sigachi Industries shares in focus after CEO remanded in Hyderabad unit fire probe
summary: Sigachi Industries shares are set to remain in focus after the company disclosed that its Managing Director and CEO was remanded in connection with the Hyderabad unit fire probe. While investigations continue, the company has assured operational continuity and appointed an interim leader to oversee day-to-day business activities.

title: IRFC, NBCC and 4 other stocks flash bullish signals, indicating possible uptrend
summary: On December 26, six NSE-listed stocks with market capitalisation above Rs 1,000 crore appeared on the bullish “White Marubozu” scanner. The pattern reflects strong intraday buying interest, where prices moved from session lows to highs, signalling firm buyer control and suggesting potential continuation of upward momentum.

title: PNB shares in focus after lender reports Rs 2,434 crore fraud linked to SREI firms
summary: Punjab National Bank shares are under scrutiny after revealing a Rs 2,434 crore borrowing fraud involving SREI Equipment Finance and SREI Infrastructure Finance. The bank has fully provisioned for the outstanding amounts linked to these companies, which previously underwent insolvency proceedings. This news follows a period of strong returns for PNB stock.

title: Coforge shares in focus on announcing $2.35 billion acquisition of AI firm Encora
summary: Coforge is set to be in focus after announcing a $2.35 billion acquisition of AI firm Encora to boost its artificial intelligence capabilities and expand its global reach. The deal, which aims to generate $2 billion in annual revenues by March 2027, marks a significant international expansion for the IT services provider.

summary: Shyam Dhani Industries is poised for a strong market debut on NSE SME on December 30, with grey market indicators suggesting a 90% listing premium. The company's Rs 38.49 crore IPO saw an overwhelming subscription of 988 times, driven by retail investors.

summary: Silver has been touching record highs almost every day over the past few days, and has given better returns than most assets. Now, Elon Musk has warned about it.

title: Nifty 50, Sensex today: What to expect from Indian stock market in trade on December 29
summary: Sensex ended the week at 85,041, consolidating just below all-time highs amid subdued participation and selective selling in heavyweight stocks. Nifty 50 ended the week at 26,042, continuing to respect its long-term rising channel on the daily chart.

title: AI reshaping commerce industry from assisted buying to autonomous transactions: Report
summary: Artificial Intelligence is starting to reshape the commerce sector, with the shift moving beyond recommendations and customer support to AI agents that can independently complete purchases on behalf of consumers and businesses, highlighted a report by Global Payments Inc., which provides technology and services for processing payments.

title: Beijing’s Point Person for Finance in Hong Kong to Leave Post
summary: China’s top financial envoy in Hong Kong is set to leave after just over a year in the role, concluding a tenure closely watched by the sector, according to people familiar with the matter.
